entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Brockville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:16 a.m. EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High 15.
entry.summary: Rain. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 15. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain at times heavy. Low 8.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Wind becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 before morning. Low 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers in the morning and early in the afternoon. A few showers beginning in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High 12. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
